class  ackermann_ekf::SensorArray
 Hub of Sensor instances, performs sensor fusion. More...
 

Namespaces

 ackermann_ekf
 

Detailed Description

Sensor fusion using extended Kalman filter.

This class oversees all the sensors to be fused and also holds the reference to the EKF instance. All measurements taken by sensors pass through the SensorArray class defined here class before entering the EKF.

Author
Ossian Eriksson <ossia.nosp@m.ne@s.nosp@m.tuden.nosp@m.t.ch.nosp@m.almer.nosp@m.s.se>
